inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Edition, Inscription and Stamp

ULC, in pencil: [L.B. 103]
markings: LRC, in pencil: [3e Etat no 3] and [Tirage 5 et.]; LRC, stamped in red: [AL] (Lugt 141); see Signed
provenance: [Richard Reed Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 2006; sold in April for PNOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2006-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in pencil: [A Lepère]; LRC on back, in pencil: [Le Pont des Arts. 3em Etat]
title: The Bridge of Arts, Paris
